title: Can you run LOL on a Chromebook with a flash drive?
body: So my dad plays league and I'm thinking of getting him a Chromebook for his birthday and what I'm wondering is could you run LOL on a Chromebook through a flash drive?

replies.body: Unfortunately, due to the low specs of Chromebooks, it most likely won't be able to meet the minimum specs that League requires. You can double check on our [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) page to be sure before you make that purchase!
I don't believe a chromebook uses an OS that can support league
